doc.field: TEXAS EASTERN TEX> UNIT FILES FOR NEW RATES

Algonquin Gas Transmission Co, a unit of Texas Eastern Corp, said it has filed for Federal Energy Regulatory Commission approval of new rate schedules. It said it has also filed for proposed service agreements for interruptible and firm transportation service. Algonquin said the filing would allow its customers to move available spot gas supplies to price competitive markets. Reuter
